text: Transient Transfection and <extra_id_0> Luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Assays ( MEF Cells )

<extra_id_0> Cebpb <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - MEFs ( 1x105 ) [ 34 ] were transfected with the indicated <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reporter plasmid ( 400 ng ) along with a <extra_id_0> beta-actin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - <extra_id_0> beta-galactosidase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reporter plasmid ( 200 ng ) by electroporation using the Invitrogen Neon ( TM ) system ( 1 pulse , 1350 V , 30 msec ) .
Transfected cells were transferred to pre-warmed media in 24 well plates and incubated for 48 hrs prior to incubation with LPS ( 100 ng / ml ) for 4 hrs where indicated .

In some experiments , plasmids encoding <extra_id_0> C/EBP-beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or <extra_id_0> C/EBP-beta phospho-acceptor mutants <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> T188A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> T217A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> S64A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) [ 38 ] - [ 40 ] or control vector were co-transfected ( 0.6-1.0 microg total DNA ) .

<extra_id_0> Luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> activity was determined and normalized to that of <extra_id_0> beta-galactosidase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> [ 38 ] using the <extra_id_0> Luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Assay System and <extra_id_0> beta-Galactosidase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Enzyme Assay System Kits , respectively ( Promega ) .
Each experiment was repeated at least three times , and triplicate samples were employed for each sample .
Expression of the <extra_id_0> C/EBP-beta phospho-acceptor mutant <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> proteins was checked for equal expression by western blot .
